Text:

någon som har problem med cracken? Mitt spel går inte att starta efter jag crackat det.... Strange.....
En fråga: när jag har laddat ner spelet och sa använda Daemon så hittar jag inte nån fil. hur ska man då kunna installera spelet?
Nu har jag laddat ner den här torrenten två gånger men det finns inga zip filer i mapparna!!!!! Varför? E jag allmänt dum, eller har något gått snett? Tacksam för hjälp....!

asso ja fattar inte hur man öppnar filerna på de här spelet.
e de nån som vet, och kan hjälpa mej??
ja vill så gärna spela sherlock holmes :)
please hjälp mej med filerna
seed pleese!!

Dags att seeda...
some people want this game...

Second, do any of you guys know if there are any new games of this kind? I mean, theese old ones are great, but i know i would love them with up-to-date grafics.

Thank you very much! I will certainly enjoy! And seed for a while!

Nice game, though I have the sound crashing from time to time. Pretty loud noise and one is barely able to hear the words they're saying. Anyone else with the same experience? Anyway, my advice: save often!
TNX.

useless.It says'it cannot  start proces cause the binkw32.dll file cannot be found.
When i do get the'play'menu,it won't start because it asks for the correct CD Rom.Even when the crack has replaced the original start.exe.
What to do now?

You dont have to burn it! Just do as leiandra said from the beginning. 1) Open .001 file in "CD1" with Winrar. You will hopefully see the BIN and CUE file here. Then extract them both to somewhere where you can find it. Do the same with "CD2". 2) Mount one of the files you've just extracted from "CD1" and you can begin to install it. Swich to the file from "CD2" when it asks for it and so on. 3) When the install is finished, go to the map you've downloaded and open the "CRACK" file with Winrar. Copy the CRACK-file from the map and paste it where you've installed the game. 4) PLAY! 

Excuse me for my bad english ;) If you have any other questions, just ask!
thanks mate!!!!
